text: 17.2 Ais 23.17, Jer 51.7, Lep 14.8, 18.3 Bɨnonɨm man keke kod mɨdebal tek, kɨli kanɨbtam bin anɨb ayɨp gɨ ajɨlak. Gɨ ajɨlɨg, binɨb lum awl yokɨp okok abe, ñɨg wayn tɨmel ne ñub ak ñɨbel, kɨlop sawl lɨl ayɨp gɨ ajelak agak.17.2 Takaw anɨb ak, takaw pal adaŋ lɨl olap apal. Bin kanɨbtam ayɨp gɨ ajɨlɨg apal ak, anɨb ak binbɨ God nop gos ma nepal, kɨli tap yepɨs yepɨs anɨb okok gɨ ajebal, tap tɨmel okok kuŋay yɨbɨl anɨgɨl gɨpal. God wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ak, ak bɨ bin ne anop kelɨgɨl, amɨl bin kanɨbtam monmon gup ak tek.
